scripts.deploy:local: yarn clean && yarn prepare-yaml && yarn codegen && graph deploy --node http://localhost:8020/ --ipfs http://localhost:5001 honour-localhost ./subgraph.localhost.yaml
scripts.prep:goerli: yarn clean && yarn prepare-yaml && yarn codegen:goerli && yarn build:goerli
scripts.deploy:goerli: graph auth --studio d14d1caae849d37c04326351150f5640 && graph deploy --studio honour-goerli ./subgraph.goerli.yaml
scripts.deploy:mainnet: yarn clean && yarn prepare-yaml && yarn codegen:mainnet && yarn build:mainnet && graph auth --studio <auth_token> && graph deploy --studio honour ./subgraph.mainnet.yaml
